xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-shp:DisclosureOfNotesOnShareholdi: Notes: 1. In accordance with SEBI Circular dated November 30, 2015 read alongwith SEBI (ICDR) Regulations, 2018, Tata AIA Life Insurance Company Limited and Tata AIG General Insurance Company Limited shareholding of 87719 Ordinary shares and 4089000 Ordinary Shares respectively of Rs. 2 each, are not considered part of Promoter Group of the shareholding pattern. They are part of Public Shareholding under the head Institutions- Insurance Companies. However further with SEBI circular dated June 30, 2022 dated SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD-1/P/CIR/2022/92 have been sub categorised as Shareholders acting as persons in concert with promoters. 2. Partly paid up shares pertain to court cases wherein Rs 1 is outstanding on 310 shares and Rs 0.50 is outstanding on 260 shares, both of face value Rs 2/- each. 3. Tata Sons Private Limited ('TSPL') being a Core Investment Company registered with RBI, is exempted under the Significant Beneficial Ownership (SBO) Rules. The Company does not have any other Significant Beneficial Owner under SBO Rules to be reported in the shareholding pattern as on December 31, 2023. 4. On reciept of NSE letter dated February 17, 2022 seeking clarification on shareholding pattern for the quarter ended December 31, 2022 and further towards the discussion held by the Company with the stock exchanges, the Company hereby reinstate Tata Consumer Products Limited (erstwhile known as Tata Global Beverages Limited) under the shareholding pattern of the Company under Promoter Group Category.

Lady Tata Memorial Trust, F K Kavrana, Dr P B Desai, Dr M Chandy
Axis Mutual Fund Trustee Limited A/C Axis Mutual Fund A/C Axis Bluechip Fund
